class piecewise_regression.model_selection.ModelSelection(xx, yy, max_breakpoints=10, n_boot=20, max_iterations=30, tolerance=1e-05, min_distance_between_breakpoints=0.01, min_distance_to_edge=0.02, verbose=True)Â¶
